name: 蔡佩芳
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中網路與整數模式、以及機率性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含網路模式、整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、專案管理等。
schedule:
Week 1~3. Network Optimization Models, Project Management
Week 4~7. Integer Programming
Week 8~10. Dynamic Programming
Week 11~13. Game Theory
Week 14~15. Decision Analysis
Week 16~18. Markov Chain
scorePolicy:
Attendance:           10%
Quizes:　　             20%
Homeworks:           20%
Mid-term Exams:    25%
Final Exam:　　     25%.
materials: Hillier, F.S. and Lieberman, G.J. (2010), Introduction to Operations Research, 9th Edition, McGraw-Hill Int’l, Taipei. (required)
